title: Full-stack Engineer
job_overview:
We’re looking for a full-stack engineer who can bootstrap production-grade apps in 1-2 weeks, and ship fully functional SaaS products in a month—with direction, not hand-holding. 

We build real software, for real businesses, on modern stacks:
Next.js + Supabase + Vercel/AWS
pgvector, embeddings, AI workflows
Cursor-first workflows—if you live in Cursor, we’ll get along well

You should be:
Fast with high standards (you ship and polish)
A natural problem solver who figures it out
A learner obsessed with tools, systems, and speed
Energized by ambiguity, not paralyzed by it
Deeply curious—AI, automation, semantic search, backend infra

This isn’t some corporate backlog job. You’ll be building systems that touch everything: file ingestion pipelines, vectorized data search, Stripe integrations, cron jobs, real-time dashboards, multi-tenant auth, and more.

What You’ll Get:
Autonomy to own big parts of the stack
High-trust, low-politics environment
Fast feedback and direct communication
Clear vision and endless problems worth solving
Room to grow as fast as you can handle
You will ship. You will learn. You will grow.

If this sounds like the challenge you’ve been waiting for, send over your GitHub, a short note on your proudest build, and let’s talk.
